item.title: [网络开发]boost::asio简介
item.description: boost前几天发布了1.51版本，更新内容请查看：http://www.boost.org/users/history/version_1_51_0.html，asio修改如下内容： Asio: Fixed an incompatibility between ip::tcp::iostream and C++11 (#7162). Decorated GCC attribute names with underscores to prevent interaction with user-defined macros (#6415). Added missing #include <cctype>, needed for some versions of MinGW. Changed to use gcc's atomic builtins on ARM CPUs, when available (#7140). Changed strand destruction to
